pageLevelProgressIndicatorBar.title: Page Level Progress indicator bar
pageLevelProgressIndicatorBar.default: Page progress. Use this to listen to the list of regions in this topic and whether they're completed. You can jump directly to any that are incomplete or which sound particularly interesting. {{percentageComplete}}%

pageLevelProgressEnd.title: Page Level Progress end
pageLevelProgressEnd.default: You have reached the end of the list of page sections.

_isEnabled.title: Is enabled
_isEnabled.description: Controls whether the Page Level Progress extension is enabled or disabled.

_showPageCompletion.title: Show page completion
_showPageCompletion.description: Controls whether the progress calculations are based on all components - or only those that are set to be displayed in Page Level Progress.

_isCompletionIndicatorEnabled.title: Show course completion indicator
_isCompletionIndicatorEnabled.description: Controls whether the completion indicator shows next to the course title.

_isShownInNavigationBar.title: Show progress in the navigation bar
_isShownInNavigationBar.description: Controls whether the completion indicator shows in the navigation bar
